document.title: Pellete de liens du 23-07-2005
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
Nachetez pas les livres Harry Potter, par Richard Stallman Lisez cet article, et nachetez aucun livre Harry Potter. (Tags: rms livres haha )
SitePoint New Articles, Fresh Thinking for Web Developers and Designers. Empowering Web Developers Since 1997 (Tags: css webdesign webzine webstandards )
AJAX: Usable Interactivity with Remote Scripting ( via ) If your bookmarks contain even one Web development blog, you'll undoubtedly know that remote scripting is being touted as the new "future of the Web". (Tags: javascript tutorial ajax )
Digital Web Magazine The web professional's online magazine of choice. (Tags: css webdesign webzine webstandards )
Acronym Search - Your source for acronyms and abbreviations ( via ) Your source for acronyms and abbreviations (Tags: xhtml acronym )
DOMSlides - Yet another standards based presentation slide system ( via ) DOMSlides turns an HTML document into presentation slides via Unobtrusive JavaScript (Tags: javascript xhtml dom presentation )
Lussumo Vanilla - The sweetest forum on the web With Vanilla we wanted to break the mold created and followed by just about every other forum on the web. (Tags: php forum )
Main Page - Devmo This site is dedicated to providing solid information, documentation, and community for Mozilla and Firefox developers of all types. (Tags: mozilla firefox community documentation )
